Text.Name: Item_RoughWoodBlock
Text.Desc: Lumber material made from wood. Can be used more effectively in crafting.

Text.Name: Item_HardWoodBlock
Text.Desc: Timber material made from Goldwood. Can be used more effectively in crafting.

Text.Name: Item_ParasolWoodBlock
Text.Desc: Timber material made from Parasol Wood. Can be used more effectively in crafting.

Text.Name: Item_LingWoodBlock
Text.Desc: Timber material made from Spiritwood. Can be used more effectively in crafting.
